fullText: Leguizamo is a master storyteller who can make you laugh and cry, sometimes within the same sentence.
dtliExcerpt: Leguizamo is a master storyteller who can make you laugh and cry, sometimes within the same sentence.
bwwExcerpt: Luckily, our host is such a relentlessly entertaining character that it's a real fun trip, seemingly fueled by gallons of Red Bull. Leguizamo enters by pulling hip-hop moves to the sound of James Brown's 'Sex Machine,' and comes very close to sustaining that frenetic pace for more than two hours, though the energy -- both his and ours -- flags toward the end.
